name: Only One Dodo
description:
Dodos have gone extinct and have arrived at the gates of hell were they are greeted by a demon who offers them a deal, last dodo alive will get a second chance. Only one dodo will rise above them all.

Very simple controls, WASD for movement, bump into dodos to push them, move mouse to rotate camera around.

There are many other features I wanted to implement, a settings menu for starters to change mouse sensitivity, audio volume and such but I ran out of time and energy :(

I have slept about 5 hours in 2 days, I put my all on this GMTK  jam and if I do not make it to the top 100 I will be very sad  but that is totally fine, I made a pretty fun game and I might continue updating it if people are interested.

I will update this after I get some much needed sleep.
